issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description: trunk tests have been hanging often lately in hudson, this time i was careful to kill and get a good stacktrace:

comments.body:

I think I found the reason or one possible reason for this. there is one place where we don't release a DWPT lock in the case of a failure. Here is a patch.
I committed the patch. I will keep this open for a while...
